did.abstract: The records consist of subject files created and maintained by Radley H. Daly as associate secretary (1986-1992) and deputy secretary and marshall of Yale University (1992-1996). The records document labor relations, committees, prizes and lectureships, special events and visitations by distinguished individuals, and Yale historical activities. Also included are Daly's files concerning the Yale Sailing Associates, 1972-1980.
